translations: v．脱口而出，冲口说出：突然说出某事，尤指不经思考或不适当的事情。

sentences.sentence: Blurts out answers before questions have been completed.
Blurts out answers before the questions have been completed.
sentences.translation: 没想好之前，答案就脱口而出。

sentences.sentence: She is wringing her hands. "You must leave, " she blurts out.
sentences.translation: 她晃了晃手，发作起来：“你要离开这里，为了你的宝贝女儿！”
